name: calculateBlendProportions
description: Calculate suggested proportions for a blend of fragrance oils. Use when the user has selected oils and wants ratios, or when they ask to adjust (e.g. "more leather, less citrus").
schema: [{"property":"oils","type":"string","description":"JSON array of { oilId, oilName }","required":true},{"property":"preferences","type":"string","description":"User preferences e.g. more leather, less citrus","required":false},{"property":"productType","type":"string","description":"candle, soap, room-spray, etc. (default: candle)","required":false}]
